src_original: hetuphalaprabandhānupacchedaḥ pravṛttir ity ucyate /  naikasmin kṣaṇe prabandhoparame vā pravṛttyupacāraḥ //  pratiniyamaḥ katamaḥ /  hetuphalanānātve pratiniyamavyavasthā /
aniṣṭasya duścaritam ityādi phalānāṃ pṛthag anyonyahetutā //
yogaḥ katamaḥ /  hetuphalānurūpye yoga iti prajñaptiḥ /

tadyathā dānasya bhogasampad anurūpeti yujyate dānasya bhogasampat phalam //  javaḥ katamaḥ /  hetuphalāśupravṛttau java iti prajñaptiḥ //  anukramaḥ katamaḥ /  hetuphalaikaikapravṛttāv anukrama iti prajñaptiḥ /
hetuphalaprabandhapravṛttau kāla iti prajñaptiḥ /  hetuphalayoḥ prabandhena pravṛttau satyāṃ yat tatra hetuphalam utpannaniruddham ,  so 'tītaḥ kāla iti prajñapyate /
yad anutpannaṃ so 'nāgataḥ /  yad utpannāniruddhaṃ sa pratyutpannaḥ kālaḥ //
deśaḥ katamaḥ /  pūrvadakṣiṇapaścimottarādharordhvāsu sarvato daśasu dikṣu hetuphala eva deśa iti prajñaptiḥ /  hetuphalasya digvyāptau deśopacāraḥ /  rūpasaṅgṛhītaṃ ca hetuphalaṃ veditavyam ,
avyutpannaśabdārthasambandhasya hi rūpasvarūpa eva sañjñā bhavati ,  na tu rūpam iti /

nirvāṇadhātur api sarvasaṃskṛtanimittapratyastamitasvarūpa iti tadālambanenāpi samādhinā samprayuktā sañjñā animittālambanā /  bhavāgram apaṭutvād animittam /  tatsamāpannasya sañjñālambanaṃ na nimittīkarotīty animittālambanā /

bhavāgrasyātrāsphuṭanimittatvāt tadālambanam animittam ucyate 'nuda[p. 31] rākanyānyāyena ,  na punas tatra nimittaṃ naivāstīty animittam /  anyathā sañjñābhāvaprasaṅga iti ,  nimittābhāve nimittodgrahaṇābhāvāt /
